Name: Mirror Broken
About the game: Summary This game is a puzzle puzzle game! ! Players need to rely on excellent eyesight to place the fragments in the correct shape, and the counter in the upper right corner can check whether the position is correct. Specific gameplay: The player clicks the mouse to move and replace the fragments. If the position is correct, the counter in the upper right corner will increase by 1, otherwise, it will not be added. After each puzzle is completed correctly, a variety of beautiful girls will be unlocked
